thread.title: BRIEF-Glintt to sell its three units for 7.0 mln euros
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Glintt to sell its three units for 7.0 mln euros | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Glintt to sell its three units for 7.0 mln euros
text:
Sept 23 Glintt Global Intelligent Technologies SA :
* Reaches deal with HCCM-Outsourcing Investment SA to sell units Glintt-Business Process Outsourcing SA, Netpeople-Tecnologias de Informacao SA and Glintt-Technology Enabled Services SA
* To sell units in post-split configuration for 7.0 million euros ($7.8 million) Source text: bit.ly/1OQNZHc
Further company coverage: ($1 = 0.8991 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom)
